argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | sucid.1 | |- A e. _V |
| 2 | 1 | #P_snid | |- A e. { A } |
| 3 |  | #P_elun1 | |- ( A e. { A } -> A e. ( { A } u. A ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- A e. ( { A } u. A ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-suc | |- suc A = ( A u. { A } ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_equncomi | |- suc A = ( { A } u. A ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_eleqtrri | |- A e. suc A |
\
 A set belongs to its successor.  This proof was automatically derived from ~ sucidALTVD using translate_without_overwriting.cmd and minimizing.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 18-Feb-2012.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
